Field Classes¶

Field Base Classes¶

class bhp_crypto.classes.BaseEncryptedField(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: django.db.models.fields.Field

A base field class to store sensitive data at rest in an encrypted format.

  • To maintain uniqueness and searchability, only the hash is ever stored in the model field.
  • The cipher is stored with the hash in the bhp_crypto.models. Crypt cipher lookup model and will be made available when required for decryption (e.g. the private key is available)
  • Salt, public key filename and private key filename are referred to via the settings file
decrypt(value, **kwargs)¶

wrap the cryptor method of same name

encrypt(value, **kwargs)¶

wrap the cryptor method of same name

get_internal_type()¶

This is a Charfield as we only ever store the hash, which is a fixed length char.

get_prep_lookup(lookup_type, value)¶

Only decrypts the stored value to handle ‘exact’ and ‘in’ but excepts ‘icontains’ as if it is ‘exact’ so that the admin search fields work.

Also, ‘startswith’ does not decrypt and may only be used to check for the hash_prefix. All others are errors.

get_prep_value(value, encrypt=True)¶

Returns the hashed_value with prefix (or None) and, if needed, updates the secret lookup.

Keyword arguments: encrypt – if False, the value is returned as is (default True)

is_encrypted(value)¶

wrap the cryptor method of same name

south_field_triple()¶

Returns a suitable description of this field for South.

to_python(value)¶

Returns the decrypted value IF the private key is found, otherwise returns the encrypted value.

Value comes from DB as a hash (e.g. <hash_prefix><hashed_value>). If DB value is being acccessed for the first time, value is not an encrypted value (not a prefix+hashed_value).

validate_with_cleaned_data(attname, cleaned_data)¶

May be overridden to test field data against other values in cleaned data.

Should raise a forms.ValidationError if the test fails

  1. ‘attname’ is the key in cleaned_data for the value to be tested,
  2. ‘cleaned_data’ comes from django.forms clean() method
